data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Deheyn, Dimitri D., Ballantyne, Lesley A. (2009): Optical characterization and redescription of the South Pacific firefly Bourgeoisia hypocrita Olivier (Coleoptera: Lampyridae: Luciolinae). Zootaxa 2129: 47-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.188333
